Texts.Chs: 而且，艾肯的语言与其他种族不同。难以理解，这意味着不信任，因为不能做交易。鼠族人说交易永远是信任的标志。没有信任。发光的人与植物粪便不好。避开。
Texts.Eng: Also, X'i is not speaking like any other race. Hard understand, which means not trust because cannot make deal. Kirhos is saying deal always mark of trust. No trust. Glow people with plant feces not good. Avoid.

Texts.Chs: 没有。这是来自人类的新词。 没有。意思是“不”，但听起来更好。用来形容我们遇到的新种族。 艾肯是带着岩石皮肤的放射源。 可以像拉屎一样拉出种子，用来制造东西。 但我们认为，站在附近是不明智的。 他们正在吃有毒的发光棒作为食物。 还记得在家乡的时候，亚斯 · 维克斯死了，死于身体上的肿瘤吗？ 不要吃有毒的发光棒。 然而艾肯并没有生病或死亡。 他们甚至更健康了。不信任。
Texts.Eng: Nope. That is new word from Human. Nope. Is mean 'no' but sound nicer. Using to describe new race we met. X'i. Is radiation with rock skin. Can release seeds like poop, and use to make things. But standing near is unwise, we are thinking. They is eating poison glow rods for food. Remember on homeworld when Yassh Vix did, and died from lumpy growths on body? No eating of poison glow rods. Yet X'i not sick and die. Is instead get better from. Not trust.
